name: Logikamente
description:
Logikamente is a full-service software company.
Since 10 years, Logikamente try to improve people starting from business processes through the use of software, especially tailor web or mobile applications.
Skilss are around software engeneering and they have turned to:
E-commerce custom platform (Magento, WooCommerce and PrestaShop)
Mobile app (Android and iOS)
Data analysis
UI/UX design
Inside the company there are skills to manage to handle large software projects and ensure continuous support over time.
